column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Daniel - Thank you for your review. I'm sorry you did not enjoy your ramen. With all due respect
column2: we are not accustomed to hearing that our ramen is "super bland
column3: so I'm prone to think our chefs may have accidentally omitted some specific pre-base ingredients. Our chefs prepare hundreds of bowls every day, statistically speaking they will make a mistake from time to time.
